Package org.odonoghuelab.molecularcontroltoolkit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connector
    The interface all connectors must implement to handle the connector initialisation.
    Dispatcher
    Helper interface that includes both the voice and gesture dispatcher methods
    GestureDispatcher
    The interface to create an application specific gesture dispatcher
    VoiceDispatcher
    Interface for handling voice events
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KinectConnector
    The Connector for the Kinect interface.
    LeapMotionConnector
    The LeapMotionConnector accesses the Leap Motion Controller using the Leap Motion Java API.
    MolecularControlToolkit
    The main entry point for the Molecular Control Toolkit.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectorType
    The enumeration for all possible connectors
